text: Template searches should take into account the name (label) as well, rather than solely relying on the file name.

There is an idea for this from Indra in the community if you want to upvote and add your feedback

<https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Searching-template-by-label-and-or-tags-on-creating-page/idi-p/686745>
Thanks, and upvoted. Seems more like a (small) bug to me. Content editors don't need to know the file name. They search by the name they see here.
